title: No longer a fan of hextech crafting
body:
Bought the 10box bundle.

Rolled a few skin shards all good whatevs.

Rolled 3 champs I already had, rerolled them into ... **fucking teemo**.

My plan was to buy every champ except that furry little cancer - legit am 4 champs off owning all and was going to be a badge of honour not to own that aids-gerbil. 

Now I have that non-refundable turdbastard-rat in my inventory permanently.

Hextech crafting has left me with a horrible taste in my mouth.

10/10 wont be doing it again.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Hello friend , if you contact rito support with a ticket you can get cancer teemo removed from your account you want get your keys back and chest but if you dont care and just want him removed that is an option for you{{champion:91}}
you're taking the joke a bit too far m8 lol

So you knew there was a decent possibility of something unfavourable happening, you decided to go ahead anyway and now you're blaming the system? 

Sounds like a popular work ethic.
no you silly sausage. you dont understand the problem at all.

It's like gambling.

They take your shit and blame it on chance.
I would rather have had a swift kick in the balls than own that puke-mouse.
